Title: Bleeder
Actors: Kim Bodnia, Mads Mikkelsen, Rikke Louise Andersson, Liv Corfixen
Plot: Leo and Louise are a young couple living together in Copenhagen. Leo often goes out with his friends while Louise usually stays home. But when Louise tells Leo she's pregnant, a spark is ignited and Leo begins to become cold and distant. His anger and self-hatred finally erupt into violence against Louise.
